title: Making a Serious team for Season 6, Plat + please.
body:
Hey guys, I'm making a team that will be a serious team, with practice time, scrim and ranked 5's all in the mix!
Need Mid, Jungle, Top and ADC.

> I need dedicated and serious players to join this team, not looking for people who rage or flame or blame through the game, wait till after the game and have your say..

> You will need to have a decent connection and be able to make all practice times, if you cannot make it, tell someone!

> Looking for a shot caller, must have experience prior and is comfortable calling during early game, mid and late game.

> Must have a working mic!

> Be able to take some constructed criticism!

> Don't leave after one loss, we will loss more then one, if you have a suggestion about something please say something. input is always welcome.

Also looking for like a coach or something that could help us out and improve our play and decision making..

Fill out this form, post bellow or add me in game if you want to talk more.

IGN:
Position:
Rank Solo:
5's:
Champ pool:
Mic:
Stable connection:
Times you can play:
Why should I choose you for this team:
Weakness:

Thanks for applying!!!!

Times you can play: Nearly any, weekends during the day I work usually.
Why should I choose you for this team: Mid laner since season one, I am extremely confident with my mid pool and a particular trait I pride myself on is my roaming. Confident shotcalling. I'm contactable easily through Steam/LoL/FB nearly always and due to my uni student lifestyle I'll be nearly always down to play.
Weakness: It's very specific but Fizz and Yasuo always give me terrible strife on most of my mid laners. If I don't get to counter pick them I'm usually in a bit of a pickle. If we want me going into a game with a set goal in mind (eg objective control, picks etc.) I usually would request to at least ban Yasuo 

Cheers.
